entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Just like the coronavirus response video, you forgot February which in this case is the gasing and abusing of peaceful protesters.  Fuck you!  We will liberate the White House!  Remove this cancer and his administration.  #AmericaOrTrump #LiberateTheWhiteHouse
